name: Living Terrain
oracle_text: Enchant land Enchanted land is a 5/6 green Treefolk creature that's still a land.

name: Fecundity
oracle_text: Whenever a creature dies  that creature's controller may draw a card.

name: Brainstone
oracle_text: {2}  {T}  Sacrifice This Card: Draw three cards  then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order.

name: Plundered Statue
oracle_text: At the beginning of the Horde's precombat main phase  reveal an additional card from the top of the Horde's library. The Horde casts that card. Hero's Reward — When This Card is put into a graveyard from anywhere  each player draws a card.

name: Sinister Concoction
oracle_text: {B}  Pay 1 life  Mill a card  Discard a card  Sacrifice This Card: Destroy target creature.

name: Creative Outburst
oracle_text: This Card deals 5 damage to any target. Look at the top five cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. {U/R}{U/R}  Discard This Card: Create a Treasure token.

name: Skyshroud Blessing
oracle_text: All lands gain shroud until end of turn. (They can't be the targets of spells or abilities.) Draw a card.

name: Explosion of Riches
oracle_text: Draw a card  then each other player may draw a card. Whenever a card is drawn this way  This Card deals 5 damage to target opponent chosen at random from among your opponents.

name: Test of Endurance
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep  if you have 50 or more life  you win the game.

name: Curse of Thirst
oracle_text: Enchant player At the beginning of enchanted player's upkeep  This Card deals damage to that player equal to the number of Curses attached to them.

name: Temporary Truce
oracle_text: Each player may draw up to two cards. For each card less than two a player draws this way  that player gains 2 life.

name: Clearwater Goblet
oracle_text: Sunburst (This enters the battlefield with a charge counter on it for each color of mana spent to cast it.) At the beginning of your upkeep  you may gain life equal to the number of charge counters on This Card.

name: Without Weakness
oracle_text: Target creature you control gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it. If its toughness is 0 or less  it's still put into its owner's graveyard.) Cycling {2} ({2}  Discard this card: Draw a card.)

name: Samut, the Tested
oracle_text: +1: Up to one target creature gains double strike until end of turn. −2: This Card deals 2 damage divided as you choose among one or two targets. −7: Search your library for up to two creature and/or planeswalker cards  put them onto the battlefield  then shuffle.
